puzzle: LUD UKWUDIL DMODNNDHOD KI NKED LUJL RP XJLDZ. LUD DMODNNDHOD RP XJLDZ JSSDJZI KH KLI YDHDPKLKHW JNN LUKHWI, JHF KH KLI ROOBSQKHW, XKLURBL ILZKAKHW LR LUD ORHLZJZQ, LUD NRX SNJOD XUKOU JNN GDH FKINKED.
solution: THE HIGHEST EXCELLENCE IS LIKE THAT OF WATER. THE EXCELLENCE OF WATER APPEARS IN ITS BENEFITING ALL THINGS, AND IN ITS OCCUPYING, WITHOUT STRIVING TO THE CONTRARY, THE LOW PLACE WHICH ALL MEN DISLIKE.
